quizzes.question: Which symbol is used to multiply variables in C++?
Which operator is used to determine the remainder?

answers.text: Parentheses first, then multiplication and division

quizzes.question: Which two statements are correct for arithmetic operations?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Operator Precedence [/h1]

Parentheses force the operations to have higher precedence. If there are parenthetical expressions nested within one another, the expression within the innermost parentheses is evaluated first. 
[note]If none of the expressions are in parentheses, [b]multiplicative [/b](multiplication, division, modulus) operators will be evaluated before [b]additive [/b](addition, subtraction) operators.[/note]
